channel.title: Unreal Tournament on JonTheNerd
channel.description: Recent content in Unreal Tournament on JonTheNerd

item.title: Unreal Tournament Server on Ubuntu Linux (10.04)
item.description: I’m putting together a server for some friends to play Unreal Tournament (yes, the original). I had heard this was doable on Linux, and I have a friend’s old laptop here to play with. I’ll be putting good links here that have helped me to get this working. I got it all setup in a VirtualBox VM, but need it on the separate machine. This old laptop has a broken screen and no hard drive…no problem!
